title: Definitions
context: [ยง431N-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter unless otherwise indicated by the context: &ldquo;Gap group individuals&rdquo; means medically uninsured persons who are residents of the State. &ldquo;Health care contractor&rdquo; means any medical group or organization which undertakes, under a prepaid health care program, to provide health care, or any nonprofit organization or insurer who undertakes, under a prepaid health care program, to defray or reimburse in whole or part, the expenses of health care. &ldquo;Health care coverage&rdquo; means contractually arranged medical, personal, or other services, including preventive services, education, case management, and outreach, provided to an eligible member. &ldquo;Medical indigence&rdquo; means the status of a person who is uninsured or lacks medical insurance. [L 1989, c 378, pt of ยง1]
